items.sentence: Tom spends less than three dollars a day for food.
The more money you make, the more money you spend.

We were shocked to learn that Tom had been killed.

My life is like a test that I haven't studied for.

There are about 1,000 students at our high school.

We're not prepared to take on this responsibility.

Tom is a lot smarter than most people think he is.
